user_query: Our company is expanding globally and we need to convert a large amount of currency. Can you provide us with a bulk currency conversion service? Also, suggest some international banks that offer favorable exchange rates for business transactions.

TaskList.description: Research and gather information about bulk currency conversion services available for businesses.
Compare exchange rates from various international banks that offer favorable rates for business transactions.
Compile a list of recommended banks based on their exchange rates and services for bulk currency conversion.
Provide the final report to the user with suggested banks and conversion services.
